song.title: Outline Bees
song.info:
The winner of Outline 2016 newschool music compo.
Vocals sung by Jon from http://studiopros.com/
A concept track mostly using samples from the X-Static Goldmine sample CDs by Polestar Magnetics. Party like it's 1992 again!
license: CC-BY-NC-SA
Riding in the van on our way to Outline Suddenly we spot the bee on our hand Riding to the party in the sunshine The bee is calling us from Atari land
Bees! Bees! Bees! Bees! Bees! Bees!
We're all covered in bees, we're calling They have bitten our knees, we're rolling A-YA-YA-YA-YAAAA we're shouting out To have us garbage-trucked
